descriptionHtml:
[color=#6aa84f][size=4]THANK TO:
[/size][/color]
Retexture inspired by chain83 and his mod:
[color=#ff00ff]Lost Dwemer Forge - Obsidian Armor and Weapons[/color]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9958/?



[color=#6aa84f][size=4]INSTALATION
[/size][/color]
Only extract it in Skyrim/data



[color=#6aa84f][size=4]A FEW WORDS
[/size][/color]
It has been a labor of nearly 5-10 hours for each retexture, please keep that in mind.
Actually this mod, replace the vanilla textures, my wish is see it together the vanilla textures.

There are some areas of the creatures which is costing me find, both files as resources will have an improvement in the future.

The resources file has been created with photoshop CS6. With it might you do in 10 seconds all the work I've done, the time consuming is select the appropriate parts of the textures, load the selection: "Seleccion Total".

My english level is poor-normal, talk to me in simple terms.



[color=#6aa84f][size=4]PERMISSION
[/size][/color]
You do not need permission to use this. Only name me in somewhere.



[color=#6aa84f][size=4]HISTORY:

[/size][/color]v1.1 Added Steam Centurion and psd(photoshop) resources
V1.0 Dwarven Sphere and Dwarven Spider



[color=#6aa84f][size=4]COMING SOON...
[/size][/color]
Dwarven Ballista from Dragonborn DLC
author: jalmpitt
